long_description: The budget-friendly Mavic Crossride Disc 29er wheelset offers sturdy, dependable performance for your trail-bound 29er adventures. Sturdy aluminum rims are strengthened where the spokes exert the greatest stress, improving life expectancy and durability. Both wheels feature 24 straight-pull, bladed steel spokes laced in a 2-cross pattern for excellent strength, resilience and stiffness. Rear hub uses Transfer System 2 freewheel system for reliable engagement when it's time to pedal. Double-sealed cartridge bearings deliver excellent longevity and smooth spinning. Front wheel fits a 15mm axle; rear futs a 12mm axle and 135mm axle width (included adaptors fit a 142mm axle width). For use with 6-bolt disc brake systems. Mavic recommended maximum combined weight of the cyclist, bike and equipment is 220 lbs. (100kg); recommended tire width is 1.5 - 2.3 in.
